trustfund:
TF020717-EMERGENCY PILOT CREDIT/BANKING
            PRIVATIZATION PROJECTS IN BHZ,TF029669-PHRD-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT PROGRAM

abstracts.cdata!:
The Transition Assistance Credit Project
            for Bosnia and Herzegovina will provide quick-disbursement
            funds for fiscal and balance of payments assistance in
            support of the State and Federation Government's
            efforts to undertake post-war reintegration and
            reorganization of governance structures, public financing,
            and the relaunching of banking and enterprise reforms. The
            main elements of the program supported by this operation
            include: a) reintegration and rebuilding of government
            institutions and the public finance structure; b) support of
            growth and employment creation in parallel with the
            reconstruction program, through initiation of privatization
            of enterprises and banks, resolution of outstanding claims,
            and enhancement of the legal and regulatory framework for
            private sector development.
